E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 5/30/1988
Subject: Progress of Anthony Telford
Dear Sir,
Anthony Telford has an ERA of 3.43 at A Vero Beach Dodgers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Progress of Carlos A. Hernandez
Dear Sir,
Carlos A. Hernandez is hitting the ball well at AA San Antonio Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .306, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 7/8/1988
Subject: Mike Devereaux healing process
Mike Devereaux is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
